hero.title: Modern SaaS Development Platform
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive SaaS application development solution to help you quickly build modern Web applications. Integrated with user authentication, multi-language support, responsive design and other core features.

userAuth.title: User Authentication System

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about platform usage

items.q: What features does this development platform include?
items.a: Includes user authentication, multi-language support, theme switching, responsive design, security assurance and other essential features for modern SaaS applications.
Clone the project code, install dependencies, configure necessary parameters according to documentation, and you can quickly start your SaaS application development.
Built on modern frontend technology stack including Next.js, React, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS to ensure development efficiency and code quality.
We provide comprehensive documentation and community support to help developers quickly resolve issues encountered during development.

howToSteps.title: Quick Start Guide
howToSteps.description: Launch your SaaS project development in just a few simple steps

steps.title: Get Code
steps.content: Clone the complete project code from the repository to your local development environment.

steps.title: Environment Setup
steps.content: Install project dependencies, configure database connections and necessary environment variables.

steps.title: Feature Customization
steps.content: Customize function modules according to business needs, adjust UI interface and interaction logic.

steps.title: Deploy Live
steps.content: After completing development, deploy to cloud platform with one click to officially provide services.
